subject: Re: [junit] Re: Help with Junitreport
msgSnippet: ... OK. The next possibility is that those files are empty or truncated. I had that problem with Cruise Control and never got to the bottom of it. Good luck.
messageBody:

> The TEST-*.xml does get generated and unfortunately I don't have

Good luck.
